General.Description: Aerium or AERM is considered as a new and pure PoS Coin. This coin has one of the most interesting staking structures. Also, this coin has very big and strong community on Discord. This will drive the value of this coin very high in the long term. The market cap can get very high as we have seen with other POS coins.
General.Features: Proof of Work and Proof of Stake cryptocurrency, only 315.000 can run efficiently on mobile devices as well as regular laptops and destops.
General.Technology: AERM was created with the newest technology Skunkhash algorithm. With no more than 1 minute, AERM uses a very low PoW time and with the low supply, which makes it fair distribution.
General.Sponsor: AERM was sponsored by Symmetry Fund which is also known as the investment fund trades and invests in ICOs and cryptocurrencies including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Ripple, Dash and Litecoin.Its main office located in 3 Edward St, George Town, Cayman Islands has experienced Finance team.
